en.description: Tenno who ally themselves with this Syndicate will receive unique Augment Mods for New Loka's favored weapons after obtaining the title of Pure. The weapons include Furis, Skana, and Vulkar.

ru.description: Один из шести основных синдикатов. Имеют в своём арсенале моды для таких варфреймов, как Гидроид, Мэг, Никс, Оберон, Тринити, Валькирия, Зефир,Эквинокс и Вуконг

ko.description: Tenno who ally themselves with this Syndicate will receive unique Augment Mods for New Loka's favored weapons after obtaining the title of Pure. The weapons include Furis, Skana, and Vulkar.

de.description: Tenno who ally themselves with this Syndicate will receive unique Augment Mods for New Loka's favored weapons after obtaining the title of Pure. The weapons include Furis, Skana, and Vulkar.

fr.description: Tenno who ally themselves with this Syndicate will receive unique Augment Mods for New Loka's favored weapons after obtaining the title of Pure. The weapons include Furis, Skana, and Vulkar.

pt.description: Tenno who ally themselves with this Syndicate will receive unique Augment Mods for New Loka's favored weapons after obtaining the title of Pure. The weapons include Furis, Skana, and Vulkar.

zh-hans.description: 与新世间结盟的Tenno在获得纯洁称号后，可以获得这些独特的强化Mod，用于新世間偏好的武器和战甲。

zh-hant.description: 與新世間結盟的Tenno在獲得純潔稱號後，可以獲得這些獨特的強化Mod，用於新世間偏好的武器和戰甲。

es.item_name: Mod de aumento de Nuevo Loka
es.description: Los Tenno quienes se unan por si mismos a este sindicato tendran acceso a los Mods de aumento únicos para armas que favorecen al Nuevo Loka después de obtener el título de Puro. Estas armas incluyen la Furis, la Skana, y la Vulkar.

it.description: Tenno who ally themselves with this Syndicate will receive unique Augment Mods for New Loka's favored weapons after obtaining the title of Pure. The weapons include Furis, Skana, and Vulkar.

pl.description: Tenno who ally themselves with this Syndicate will receive unique Augment Mods for New Loka's favored weapons after obtaining the title of Pure. The weapons include Furis, Skana, and Vulkar.

uk.description: Тенно, які об’єднаються з цим синдикатом, отримають унікальні модифікатори-розширення для ворфреймів: Гідроїд, Меґ, Нікс, Оберон, Тріниіті, Валькірія, Зефіра, Еквінокс та Вукон, а також зброї: Фурис, Пантера, Скана та Вулкар.
